title: About
text:
About this site
Hi! My name is Gurpreet. I am a senior studying Management and International Business and Management with a minor in Data Science.
I’m passionate about luxury fashion industry and I enjoy working on data driven projects to see how businesses can create a competitive advantage with this across globe.
In my free time I enjoy reading novels, traveling and dancing.
Through this portfolio, I want to showcase my coursework, projects, skills and professional development.

title: Gurpreet Kaur
text:
Professional Experience
Student Affairs & Elections Commissioner
Associated Students, CSUMB | Nov 2025 – Present
- Chair and supervise an Elections Committee of 10–15 members.
- Represent 5,000+ students in governance meetings.
- Ensure compliance, accountability, and transparent student leadership processes.
Event Coordinator Assistant
Otter Cross Cultural Center | September 2025 – Present
- Support planning and execution of large-scale cultural events.
- Assist with logistics, registration, and crowd coordination.
- Collaborate with staff and student leaders to promote inclusion and engagement.
Education Abroad Ambassador
CSUMB | September 2025 – December 2025
- Advise 20+ students weekly on global programs, financial aid, and visa requirements.
- Facilitate cross-cultural workshops and outreach events.
- Track engagement data to improve advising workflows.
